errors.format: Please enter a valid email address

errors.min: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.special: Password must contain at least one special character

rules.noUsernamePart: Must not contain your username or email part

login.title: Welcome back!
login.registrationPendingReviewHint: Your account registration may be under review, or subject to further verification.

errors.forbidden: You don’t have permission to access this area.
errors.server: An error occurred on the server. Please try again later.

status.pending: Your account has been created and is pending review. You will be able to sign in once it is approved.
status.success: Your account has been created successfully. You are being logged in…

errors.conflict: We’re unable to create this account at the moment. Please check your information or try again later.
errors.forbidden: You do not have the necessary permissions to perform this action.
errors.server: A server error occurred. Please try again later.

login.title: Login and Registration
login.description: Manage the features available on the login and registration screens.

forgetPassword.label: Forgot password
forgetPassword.description: Allow users to request a password reset from the login screen.

registration.label: User registration
registration.description: Allow new users to create an account from the login screen.

reviewPendingRegistration.label: Review registrations
reviewPendingRegistration.description: New accounts require manual approval before they can sign in.
